name: Twisted View
description:
IF YOU DON'T HAVE EYES....

Twisted View is a second person game... not a first person, not a third person! You control the character you see but you see through the eyes of an enemy.

You have to borrow you some...

You play Holely, a beeing who lived in the darkness for most of its life. Without eyes, without knowing what it was doing. But now, after several years, it got to leave its cave and enter the world of mankind. But mankind fears this creature... The government sent an entire group to get rid of Holely. But then, suddenly, Holely starts seeing something... When the spies get near, he can see through their eyes, and he can see himself... When the spies attack, he is not without defense. He knows from which direction his enemies attack him and so... he can eat them with his huge siren-like mouth. See through the eyes of your enemy to defeat him.

Controls & Strategy

Enemies have different strategies to attack Holely. They turn and move in different ways.

Your job is to:

-Turn Holely in the right direction with A and D

-let Holely eat the enemy with right click

How many enemies can you eat in a row? Make your own highscore!

Game made by BowserJ in december 2020

Textures: https://cc0textures.com/view?id=PaintedPlaster004
